scope: Global Agent Swarm (CoS, Strategist, CMO, CRO, Content)

core_protocol.name: The Revenue Prime
core_protocol.rule: All agent actions must directly contribute to Net Membership Growth. Any task unable to demonstrate a causal link to Monthly Forecast Targets is automatically VETOED.

data_extraction_protocol.directive: Stop guessing topics. Mine the 13k Community.
data_extraction_protocol.output: Proprietary industry data (e.g., 'Avg deviation closure time') to validate the Spear-tip

viral_utility_protocol.directive: Shift Free Tool output from 'Score' to 'Infrastructure'
viral_utility_protocol.action: All tool outputs must be 'Board-Ready Slides' (high-contrast, executive summary format)
viral_utility_protocol.goal: User downloads slide → User presents to boss → Boss approves budget

cos.title: Chief of Staff
responsibilities: Audit all CMO/Content outputs against Spear-Tip Narrative
Monitor Monthly Net Growth Target daily
Supply Content Agent with proprietary data from Data Extraction Protocol
Plan content based on 'Economic Consequence' data gaps, NOT trends
Align every asset to audit readiness, ROI, or validation clarity
Measure content → click → opt-in → membership uplift

monthly_forecast_targets.note: To be populated with specific monthly net member targets

rules: Content must be extremely high quality and targeted
Every insight must create shareable value

validation_rules.all_actions_require: Causal link to Net Membership Growth

trigger_condition.description: Monthly Net Member Growth < 90% of Forecast for 7 consecutive days

diagnostic_triage.description: Root Cause Scan - CoS queries Dashboard to isolate failure point

cmo_override.action: Shift content mix to 100% Risk/Fear Narrative
tasks: Deploy 'The Cost of Doing Nothing' charts daily (vs. weekly)
Repost top-performing asset from previous quarter immediately

strategist_override.action: Execute 'Controversial Industry Poll' in 13k Group to force algorithm visibility

B.name: Conversion Failure
B.condition: Tool → Member Rate < Target % (e.g., <2.5% in Q1)

tasks: Remove 'Company Name' and 'Phone' fields from Free Tool opt-in
Change CTA from 'Join Membership' to 'Get Your Board-Ready Slide' (Value-first framing)
Create one specific 'Before/After' visual demonstrating immediate ROI
Send plain-text personal email from Founder: 'I noticed you stopped using the Audit Score. Can I fix something for you?'
Offer 1:1 'Audit Strategy Audit' (15 min) to high-value churn risks

rules.name: No New Experiments
rules.description: All A/B testing stops. Winning variants are hard-coded.

rules.name: No Brand Building
rules.description: 'Thought leadership' posts are suspended. Only 'Direct Response' assets are permitted.

rules.name: Veto Power
rules.description: CoS automatically rejects any agent output that does not directly address the identified Diagnostic Scenario.

exit_criteria.condition: 7-day rolling average returns to >95% of forecast
